thread.title: Not a Light Traveler: When Kim Met Xi, He Brought His Maybach

author: Chun Han Wong
title: Not a Light Traveler: When Kim Met Xi, He Brought His Maybach
text:
BEIJING—Kim Jong Un’s trip to China this week, his first known overseas flight as North Korea’s leader, looks like a logistical dry run for a summit with President Donald Trump.
The summit is set for Singapore on June 12, Mr. Trump tweeted Thursday, after ruling out a meeting with Mr. Kim at the demilitarized zone between the two Koreas, a location the U.S. president previously shortlisted alongside the Southeast Asian city-state.
... RELATED VIDEO What Could Go Wrong at a Trump-Kim Summit? A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable. To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
